meanings.definition: twisting or turning in different directions
meanings.sent1: The winding river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The path through the forest was long and winding.
meanings.sent3: The winding road seemed to play a game of hide and seek with the travelers.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took a winding path through memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The winding staircase led to a hidden room at the top of the tower.

meanings.definition: a road, path, or river that twists and turns
meanings.sent1: The winding through the mountains offered breathtaking views.
meanings.sent2: We followed the winding of the river to reach the hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent3: The winding resembled a playful snake slithering through the landscape.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the winding was both challenging and exciting.
meanings.sent5: The winding of the path added an element of mystery to the journey.

meanings.definition: the act of coiling or twisting around something
meanings.sent1: The winding of the rope around the pole secured the boat in place.
meanings.sent2: She watched the winding of the thread around the spool with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The winding of the vines around the tree created a natural work of art.
meanings.sent4: The winding of the snake around its prey was a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The winding of the scarf around her neck kept her warm in the chilly breeze.
